description:
Rich kid Shutarou Mendou airdrops into Tomobiki High and is a big hit with the ladies, but not so much with the boys. Concerned by the daily horoscope, Lum whips out a strange device to figure out if she`s better paired with Mendou or her darling!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mendou wa Trouble to Tomo ni! / Seiza wa Meguru
面堂は トラブルとともに! - 星座はめぐる
